metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14880 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The OSPFv3 parser in tcpdump before 4.9.3 has a buffer over-read in print-ospf6.c:ospf6_print_lshdr().

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14880` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
